options.content:
* Select the switch from the dropdown above.
* For simulated GNS3 switches platform data like PDUs, FANs etc. will not be available for obvious reasons.
* Graph may show "No Data" for the metrics which don't have respective configuration on the switch.
* As an internal mgmt. in our lab, outside of working hours Real Physical Switches are powered down, Hence monsoon shows no data for that duration.

result.text: This is a Real Physical Switch

panels.title: NTP Jitter- Mean deviation in times between the switch and the NTP server.
Round-trip delay to the NTP server.
NTP Offset- Time difference between the switch and the NTP server
DOM Optic Threshold Info. (power=dBm, vcc=volts, tempt.= °C, bias= mA)
Size of the Ethernet Frames received
Size of the Ethernet Frames transmitted
Unix Time since last flap of interface
Total IPV4 BGP Messages Tx from Peers
Total EVPN BGP Messages Tx from Peers
Total BGP IPV4 Messages Rx by Peers
Total BGP EVPN Messages Rx by Peers
BGP IPV4 Prefixes Tx from Peers
BGP EVPN Prefixes Tx from Peers
BGP IPV4 Prefixes Rx by Peers
BGP EVPN Prefixes Rx by Peers
Number of remote VTEPs associated with VNI
Number of ARPs cached for the VNI
Number of L2 vnis associated with an L3 VNI
Number of Mac Addresses learned VNI
